ingestData module¶

The ingest Data script allows us to import data from a remote repository as a .tar file and then using the dataset to create a train and test data upoin which we will train and test our models.

ATTRIBUTES¶

Folderstr

This accepts the name of the folder you want to save your test and train datasets in.

Trainfilestr

This accepts the name of the trainfile.

Testfilestr

This accepts the name of the testfile.

Log Levelstr

This accepts the log level for the logger.

Log Pathstr

This accepts the path to where the log files will be stored into.

No console logstr

This enables us to not output the logs in the console.

ingestData.data_prepared(data, fileName='train')[source]¶

The function is responsible for cleaning the dataset, fill the missing values, perform encoding on categorical variable and storing it in the given fileName.

data : DataFrame fileName : str

Name of the file

ingestData.fetch_housing_data(housing_url='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ageron/handson-ml/master/datasets/housing/housing.tgz', housing_path='datasets/housing')[source]¶

Fetches the dataset from the url and extracts it to a given path.

housing_urlstr

URL from which the dataset has to be fetched

housing_pathstr

Path where the dataset has to be stored

ingestData.income_cat_proportions(data)[source]¶

Returns value counts fraction of each income category.

data : dataframe

DataFrame

ingestData.load_housing_data(housing_path='datasets/housing')[source]¶

Function to read the csv file.

housing_pathstr

Path where the .csv exists

DataFrame
